title: To Your Heart’s Content
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>....Shizuku-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What may it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s kind of unsettling when you keep, umm.... staring at me like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’m sorry. But you’re the only one I have left, Dia-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>This time, the drama club gave me the role of a beautiful, graceful, and well-mannered lady. That’s why can you please let me study you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I’m honored. But, doesn’t Nijigaku have Shioriko-san, she seems to also be a perfect fit for the role, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Shioriko-san.... she, umm, ran aw-.... Had some errands to take care of. That’s why it has to be you, Dia-san! Please guide me! I’m begging you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ran.... I see, I understand. If you’re okay with me, then please use me as your reference<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you so much! Ah, can I film some videos too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
